familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former president/member of Trump International Hotels Management LLC, which Trump owned as of his 2016 financial disclosure. The company's current activity status and ownership structure were not articulated in his 2017 financial disclosure, although that document did reveal that he had earned more than $2 million in management fees in the past year.
familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.business: Trump International Hotels Management LLC (D/B/A Trump Hotel Collection [Hawaii], Trump Hotel Collection [New York])

conflict: Trump International Hotels Management D/B/A Trump Hotel Collection
